meanings.definition: The action of forging a document or signature.
meanings.sent1: The police were investigating the forgeries found at the bank.
meanings.sent2: She was caught attempting to sell forgeries of famous paintings.
meanings.sent3: The forgeries were so poorly done that even a child could spot them.
meanings.sent4: His lies were like forgeries, deceiving everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The forgeries were so convincing that even experts were fooled.

meanings.definition: Copies, imitations, or reproductions of something that are made with the intent to deceive.
meanings.sent1: The forgeries of the famous watch were sold at a high price.
meanings.sent2: The art collector unknowingly purchased several forgeries.
meanings.sent3: The forgeries were so convincing that even the experts were fooled.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a forgery, hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The forgeries were so well-made that they passed as authentic.
